channel.title: Run-Server
channel.description:
When I attempt to run my source it say's this.
[img]http://puu.sh/5ei5I.png[/img]
Here is the coding...
[code]@echo off title Deception "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]

item.title: Run-Server
item.dc:creator: @Barrickz Barrickz
item.description:
@Barrickz wrote:

I need the whole thing, that doesn’t look right lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Run-Server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[code][quote=“Barrickz, post:8, topic:535441”]I deleted the whole PATH by accident? I can’t run that even now lol. Help?[/quote]
The net says this is your original path:

[code%SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;%SYSTEMROOT%\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Run-Server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

@echo off TITLE Server Online! "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\"java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server TITLE Server Offline! pause Try that.

Read full topic

item.title: Run-Server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Why are you trying to run your server with Javac? Javac is a compiler…
Change: “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe” to "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\java.exe"
Note: You can usually replace “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe” with just the word java

Read full topic

item.title: Run-Server
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

It means that it does not recognize the -Xmx800m part in the bat file.

Read full topic

item.title: Run-Server
item.dc:creator: @Barrickz Barrickz
item.description:

When I attempt to run my source it say’s this.

Here is the coding…

@echo off title Deception "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_45\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
